benchmark_details.name: FDM-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: FDM-Bench is a benchmark dataset designed to evaluate LLMs on FDM-specific tasks, including user queries and G-code anomaly detection.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the effectiveness of LLMs on a range of FDM-specific tasks.

data.source: G-codes are generated from 3D printing processes, and questions are curated from industry experts and educational resources.
data.annotation: G-codes and user queries are designed to represent various FDM contexts and expertise levels.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on human evaluator scores for free-form questions and accuracy percentages for MCQs.
methodology.interpretation: Accuracy reflects how well the model's responses match expected answers, while precision evaluates focus and relevance.
methodology.baseline_results: Prior model evaluations included GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Llama-3.1-70B, and Llama-3.1-405B.
methodology.validation: Validation is done through expert evaluations and automatic scoring of multiple-choice questions.
